front.title: IEEE Draft Standard for Ethernet Amendment 1: Physical Layer Specifications and Management Parameters for Extended Ethernet Passive Optical Networks
front.abstract: This draft is an amendment of IEEE Std 802.3-2012. It provides physical layer specifications andmanagement parameters for EPON operation on point-to-multipoint passive optical networks supportingextended power budget classes of PX30, PX40, PRX40, and PR40. This draft is prepared by the IEEEP802.3bk Extended EPON Task Force for the first IEEE Sponsor Ballot. This draft expires 6 months afterthe date of publication or when the next version is published, whichever comes first.
